idea:
Building a “Digital India” is today’s mission. And “Digitising Healthcare in India” is our start-up’s goal. “Health is Wealth.” Clinics and hospitals are the benefactors of this wealth. We aid these benefactors in this wealth management by implementing customized clinical and hospital management software.
The USP of our software is the use of Aadhaar card of patients to maintain their files. The use of UID is the basis of uniform digitization. The software also has a provision for organ donor registration in accordance to the rules and regulations stated by NOTTO. Apart from this, the software is built from several modules. The appointment module implements an algorithm that automates the conventional token system used in queue management of patients. This automatically re-arranges appointments in the event of delay of either patient or doctor.
 All software developed are hand stitched according to client requirement. This accommodates all different procedures and routines which vary across clinics of varying specialities. The user interface is highly simplified for the quick use of doctors and receptionists. The software allows integration with other medical entities and paves way for micromanagement of healthcare. Hectic lifestyle is making people acutely aware of their health. A direct result is the increasing amount of medical data and the need for its digitized management. This is the basis of our scalability. This paired with the improved features of our software are central to the widening of our scope and scalability to infinity.
name: VPS TECHUB PRIVATE LIMITED

idea:
Moneycalc - Financial Services (offline or online) are designed around product silos and hence money experiences become fractured. This results in friction and sub-optimal outcomes across savings, expenses, loans, investing, retirement, property, insurance.

Our platform has the power to seamlessly & intelligently bring together advisory, counselling and financial products to create efficient experiences across investing, lending, insurance and cashflows.
name: Truenorth Labs Private Limited

idea: J Group Robotics has emerged itself as a market leader in creating 3D printers of optimum quality. It proved itself to be cost effective, cost saving and tool to quickly designs. 3D printers allowed efficient use of resources with no compromise in the quality. Various industries such as Automobiles, Defense, Engineering equipment, Medical, Architecture, Consumer products, Designing and Manufacturing Industries are going to get hugely benefitted from its 3D printer. Even industries such as Jewelry Designs, Cell Phone covers, Toys, and Trophy manufacturing companies can make use of the 3D printer to test prototypes, modeling technique, manufacture low volume production and also benefit in reducing the cost of mould making.
name: Jariwala Robotics Private Limited
